title: looking for a duo in bronze
body: I am looking for someone to play ranked with, I am currently a bronze player and have been away from the game for a year or two. I am back in and now want to level my way into silver with someone or a team. I main ADC but can play all roles and am happy wherever. I want to play with people who don't troll and communicate well. Add me and send me a message if you are interested and we can start playing!

replies.body: hiiya, i do main top and good supp add me if you want ign: thorneka3 (bronzie too)
